# AI Prompts

This directory contains reusable prompt templates for AI-assisted multi-block plugin development.

## Files

- **prompts.md** - Prompt template definitions and examples for multi-block development

## Purpose

Prompt templates provide:

- Consistent AI interaction patterns for blocks
- Reusable multi-block code generation templates
- Standardised block documentation formats
- Common multi-block development task workflows
- CPT and taxonomy generation prompts
- SCF field configuration prompts

## Usage

Prompts are referenced by AI development tools to generate consistent, high-quality multi-block code and documentation that follows WordPress block development standards.
